title: Sex And The City star Sarah Jessica Parker believes women are better equipped to design heels
text:
She helped make high-end Manolo Blahnik heels the must-have shoe of the 2000s.

But Sarah Jessica Parker believes that no one is better suited to creating footwear for women, than other women - specifically female designers.

The 54-year-old, who has her own shoe line, SJP by Sarah Jessica Parker, says years spent wearing heels are vital research.

'I don't think male designers have had the experience': Sex And The City star Sarah Jessica Parker (pictured) said this week that she believes women are better equipped to design heels

Speaking to the Sydney Morning Herald this week, the Sex and the City star said: 'I want to hear what [customers are] needing and wanting and how our shoes feel.

'The reason our business has grown the way it has is because of the comfort. It's not an easy problem to solve because it's a peculiar engineering issue.

'And I don't think male designers typically have had the experience or opportunity to put their own shoes on and do what we expect them to do,' she added.

Well heeled! Sarah Jessica's Sex and the City character, Carrie Bradshaw, was a notorious lover of luxury high heels, in particular those from Manolo Blahnik. Pictured in Sex and the City

Surge: Being featured in the trend-setting HBO show caused a surge in popularity for many male-designed shoe brands. Pictured in Sex and the City

Sarah Jessica's Sex and the City character, Carrie Bradshaw, was a notorious lover of luxury high heels, in particular those from Manolo Blahnik, Christian Louboutin and Jimmy Choo.

Being featured in the trend-setting HBO show caused a surge in popularity for the male-designed shoe brands.

'It's a brand match made in heaven for Hit and our largely female audience. SJP has been an inspiration to many!

'As an astute businesswoman, actress, style icon and mother, we can't wait to share her story with Australian audiences.'

The two-hour breakfast event will see Sarah take the stage to share insights from her glittering showbiz career and various successful business ventures.

Sarah Jessica will appear in Sydney on October 21, and in Melbourne on October 22.
